overview: Sashka lives in Kostroma, in a dormitory. He doesn’t have a permanent job, but he has alcohol and drug addiction instead. He is 30 years old, and he is completely lost. He tried to enter the monastery, but returned for a new romantic interest. A year later, Sashka's life is different. He now lives in another city with that girl and her son, together they had a daughter. He has a flat mortgaged, he works as a baker and from time to time goes to Kostroma to make some extra money. Life has changed. Has Sashka changed?
title: My Friend Sashka
